Class Debug

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.Debug
  • Deprecated.

    public final class Debug
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: Debugger

    Description: Provides debugging functions

    Depends on simple.io.WriterOutputStream

    Created: 2004

    Version:
    2.6
    Author:
    Kenneth Pierce
    See Also:
